revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=ReadyNAS |revision=RND4000v2 (NV+ v2) |asin=B006427IY4 |est_release_date=11/06/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=DIN |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |fla2=512 KiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L512 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ1G83DFR-H9C |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=4 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1),, |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, SATA 4-Port Multiplier;Marvell;88SM4140;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Host Controller;NEC;Î¼PD720200;;1;,,, SMBUS Advanced Power Controller;Nuvoton;NCT3012S;;1;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;1;,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;TI;TPS65251;;1;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT8105;;1;,,, 30V, 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435BZ;;8;,,, 30V, 82A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS6673BZ;;1;,,, 30V, 42A N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS0312S;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS7692;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4435;;1;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver w/3-State Output;TI;SN74HCT244;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;G47B;;1;,,, |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, fan, metal case, temperature sensor, LCD Display, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell (v3.4.27);, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8; |tp_firmware=Debian |default_ip=192.168.168.168 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=E0:46:9A, }} {{TagLine|Diskless 4-Bay/USB 3.0 Network Storage for Home/SoHo Users}} :''Netgear RND4000-200 ReadyNAS NV+ v2''
[http://support.netgear.com/product/RND4000v2%2B$28ReadyNAS%2BNV$2b%2Bv2$29 Product Support] :[http://natisbad.org/NAS5/index.html Debian and upstream kernel]
* CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (ARMADA 300) @1.6GHz
Rear 2x USB Ports are from the USB 3.0 Host Controller :whose configuration is provided by the 2nd Flash.
''NAS 4-BAY-NV+_V4-M6282'' and ''REV: 3.0'' are silkscreened on the main PCB :''NAS 4-BAY-NV+_V4-M6282-BP REV:V1.0'' is silkscreened on the SATA riser :''NAS 4-BAY-NV+_V4-M6282-IO REV:V3.1'' is silkscreened on front LED and USB board
A Winstar WH1602D-TTI-JT 16x2 Dot Matrix LCD Display provides status information.
